name: Mecha Phantom Beast Raiten
desc: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast Token" (Machine/WIND/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0), also you cannot use monsters as materials for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon for the rest of this turn, except "Mecha Phantom Beast" monsters. This card's Level is increased by the total Levels of all "Mecha Phantom Beast Tokens" you control. While you control a Token, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
